body:
Hello!

Recently, I've been missing DTC maps, they just haven't been around and I think we should bring the gamemode back to Avicus. Your feedback is appreciated, and answering the following questions would be very helpful. From the answers, I can use them to develop maps and maybe future events can be DTC based.

1) What kind of DTC maps do you like? (DTC or DTC + DTM?)

2) Should we include TNT on our DTC maps? (This will lead us to adding diamond into the maps.)

3) For Public or Tournament? Also, how should the gamemode be reintroduced?

Thank you ! Also, please give reasoning behind you answers, and don't troll, this is a serious thread.

title: I Need Your Opinion: DTC

replies.body:
1) What kind of DTC maps do you like? (DTC or DTC + DTM?)
It depends, i like the DTC + DTM maps with tnt, like with two monuments and the main core

2) Should we include TNT on our DTC maps? (This will lead us to adding diamond into the maps.)
Yes, you should include tnt, is fun doing cannons and it good to watch. also plays like doing a cannon quickly to break the monument is A W E S O M E

3) For Public or Tournament? Also, how should the gamemode be reintroduced?
For tournament it would be great, idk how should the gamemode be reintroduced, but the official should get like an idea to do it.

replies.body:
I'm sorry, but every Avicus attempt at DTC has been rather poor in terms of maps, and I don't trust that the community understands enough how to develop the meta on this server. I would rather go to Stratus to play DTC, because that has been a continuation of 5 years worth of maps, tournaments, and meta development.

One builder taking on a project to reintroduce DTC without prior map developer discussion won't happen.

replies.body: cannons are too much effort and diamond memers r dum
replies.body_tagged: cannons are too much effort and diamond memers r dum

replies.body:
1. DTC+DTM. I don't like maps with 1 objective, it makes them become boring and stalemate faster.

2. I quite like TnT in DTC, but only on certain maps. I don't understand why a tnt map NEEDS diamonds, like you stated. Tnt maps work fine, mostly even better, without annoying diamonds.

3. Public, but better den before. Previous attempts, instead of slowly adding DTC there were 4-6 DTC in rots all of a sudden.
Just add 1 or 2 DTC maps, and swap those for others every week or 2 to keep everyone interested.
